channel.title: Considering playing again
channel.description:
I've been seeing all of these posts in this section, and I'm kind of wanting to play again, but I simply can't get past the changes they've implemented recently.
If I did play again, I would probably be F2P only (or at the very least, until most of the F2P skills are high-level).
Recently, I've gone and implemented a lot of the vanilla features into my server, just to play something that [b]isn't[/b] the Jagex implementation.
I know that playing is ultimately up to me, but what are your opinions?

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Talking about retired people… I know a retired guy who has like 50 million tokens on pogo

Read full topic

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

haha yeah I’ve heard about those scenarios…to be honest there are more older people who play now then you may realize.

Read full topic

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:16, topic:430663”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=533340.msg3899820#msg3899820 date=1327647898]
I can top that.

I met this 63 year old guy who was retired and was completely maxed.

Then again if he is retired then he really doesn’t have anything else to do so in a way I don’t blame him.

I play rs and I’m sane!11
ish…
[/quote]You don’t understand… old lady hollering into a microphone with a “pre-war” speech…freaky as hell…then when the war starts she is horrid mean xD … " jeremy why didn’t you #$&#*### that guy up! I’ll have your arse! " etc…[/quote]
Some guy got his Mom to play in our clan.

Read full topic

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

JavaTC:

If Jagex gave a single fucking shit about their community maybe I would play again. 80% of them are under the age of 12 and only play to boast to their friends that they just pked full bandos while lagging. Tell me if you ever find 1 sane person who doesn’t live on their own little planet.

Believe it or not, some people actually play because it’s fun. Not to brag to their friends that they can pk.

Read full topic

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:12, topic:430663”]23? Insane.

I play rs sometimes just to remember the old times, like when i would WC with a friend and such.

But if you want to play again or feel the need to just do it, no harm done![/quote]The slayer clan I am in there is this real like 51 year old lady who plays

Funny part is she sometimes substitutes in clan wars for teamspeak calling xD

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Stay out of pking and the community wont anger you so much. I despise pking/staking/dicing simply because of all the cocky elitism it causes amongst players.

Read full topic

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

The game in general is just fucked. The economy sucks, the lag is horrible, the updates are half assed. In my opinion, you should find a new game to play.

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

It’s not worth playing it. The game is just terrible now.
The only fun thing I enjoy about playing is glitching the game and recovering old accounts.

item.title: Considering playing again
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I know what you mean Zyle. It’s either you have to up with RS’s crappy new graphics/features…or…remake what you loved and add the stuff you wish they had added. But if you choose the second it gets very very lonely (

I suggest playing RS about an hour or two a day then work on rsps the rest of the time That way it helps to feed that desire but not overcome it.

Read full topic
